page.para: Dad is go/ing to work. He will be late.
Chi/fu/ndo and Da/li/tso are go/ing to school. They will be ear/ly.
Mum is go/ing to the farm. She will pick maize.
Grand/ma is pick/ing man/goes. She will sell them.
Chi/so/mo is help/ing grand/ma. She puts the man/goes in the bas/ket.
Mrs Tem/bo is go/ing to the mar/ket. She will buy fish and to/ma/toes.
The hen is go/ing to the hen house. She will lay an egg.
The dog is go/ing no/where. He is dream/ing.
